solution_line_template: The smaller bags each have {main_chest_coins}/{half_divisor}=<<{main_chest_coins}/{half_divisor}={coins_per_small_bag}>>{coins_per_small_bag} gold coins each
So in total, they have {coins_per_small_bag}*{num_small_bags}=<<{coins_per_small_bag}*{num_small_bags}={total_small_bag_coins}>>{total_small_bag_coins} coins
So he finds {total_gold_found}/{diving_hours}=<<{total_gold_found}/{diving_hours}={gold_per_hour}>>{gold_per_hour} coins an hour
